overview: Enraptured by the idea of starting a business for pleasure, not for money, a lesbian couple set about planning the sexiest house of pleasure ever to be built. You guessed it, they calling it Club Pink Velvet. They go over the top and under the covers researching the project and the hottest Hungarians get caught up in their quest.  Classic Viv Thomas lesbian fare at it's very best
title: Club Pink Velvet - The Beginning
